author: Richard Hall, Richard Hall
title: Ground Zero: How New York became the epicentre of the global coronavirus outbreak
description: Makeshift morgues outside of hospitals, sirens in the streets and soon a quarantine. Richard Hall reports on the fight against the coronavirus in New York.
content: In every Hollywood disaster movie, New York somehow finds itself at the centre of it all. It is a peril of being the most recognisable city in the world that it always seems to bear the brunt of the alien invasions, environmental collapse and the deadly storm… [+12311 chars]
